verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1867>Darius<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> the month of <S%H3691>Chislev.<s%>

The people <S%H1004>of<s%> <S%H410>Bethel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8272>Sharezer<s%> and Regem <S%H7278>Melech,<s%> and their <S%H582>men,<s%> to <S%H2470>entreat<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6440>favor,<s%>

and to <S%H559>speak<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Should I <S%H1058>weep<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5144>separating<s%> <S%H6213>myself,<s%> as I have done these so many <S%H8141>years?<s%>"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6684><s%> 'When you fasted and <S%H5594>mourned<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> month for these <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> did you at <S%H6684>all<s%> fast to <S%H6684>me,<s%> really to me?
When you <S%H398>eat,<s%> and when you <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H398>don't<s%> you eat for <S%H8354>yourselves,<s%> and drink for yourselves?

<S%H1697>Aren't<s%> these the words which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> when <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> and in <S%H7961>prosperity,<s%> and its <S%H5892>cities<s%> around <S%H5439>her,<s%> and the <S%H5045>South<s%> and the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> were <S%H3427>inhabited?<s%>'"

"Thus has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H559>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8199><s%> 'Execute <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H7356>compassion<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

<S%H6231>Don't<s%> oppress the <S%H490>widow,<s%> nor the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> nor the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> and let none of you <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376>against<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>'
But they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7181>listen,<s%> and <S%H5414>turned<s%> their <S%H3802>backs,<s%> and <S%H3513>stopped<s%> their <S%H241>ears,<s%> that they might not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

<S%H7760>Yes,<s%> they made their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> as hard as <S%H8068>flint,<s%> lest they might <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> by his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> Therefore <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> came from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

It has come to pass <S%H7121>that,<s%> as he called, and they refused to <S%H8085>listen,<s%> so they will <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I will not <S%H8085>listen,<s%>" <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%>

"but I will scatter them with a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which they have not <S%H3045>known.<s%> Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5674>them,<s%> so that no man passed through nor <S%H7725>returned:<s%> for they <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate.<s%>"
